forecast-period.text: Mostly sunny morning. High chance of showers, most likely during this afternoon and evening. The chance of a thunderstorm during this afternoon and evening. Light winds becoming southerly 15 to 25 km/h in the middle of the day then tending southeasterly in the late afternoon.
Moderate
Sun protection 9:00am to 4:20pm, UV Index predicted to reach 9 [Very High]
Partly cloudy. High chance of showers. Winds south to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h becoming light before dawn then becoming southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h in the middle of the day.
Cloudy. Medium chance of showers in the morning and afternoon. Winds south to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h shifting north to northeasterly 20 to 30 km/h during the afternoon.
Partly cloudy. Winds northerly 20 to 30 km/h.

Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a shower. Light winds becoming northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the day.
